privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Pecal (the 'Company') values your privacy and complies with relevant laws including the Personal Information Protection Act. This Privacy Policy explains what personal information we collect, how we use it, how long we retain it, and how we dispose of it when you use our services.

section1.title: 1. Personal Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect the following personal information to provide our services.

required.title: a. Required Information
items: Service usage records, IP address, cookies, access logs

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Collection and Use
section2.content: We use the collected personal information for the following purposes.
purposes: Membership registration and management: Member identification, identity verification, registration confirmation
Service provision: Task management, team collaboration, project management features
Service improvement: New service development, personalized services, statistical analysis
Customer support: Inquiry handling, notice delivery, complaint resolution
Marketing and advertising: Event information and participation opportunities (only with consent)

section3.title: 3. Retention and Use Period
section3.content: In principle, we destroy personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use has been achieved.
retention: Member information: Until membership withdrawal (except when required by law)
Service usage records: 3 years (Protection of Communications Secrets Act)
Consumer complaint or dispute resolution records: 3 years (E-Commerce Act)
Payment and supply records: 5 years (E-Commerce Act)

section4.title: 4. Provision to Third Parties
section4.content: We do not provide personal information to third parties in principle. However, exceptions apply in the following cases.
exceptions: When users have given prior consent
When required by law or requested by investigative agencies following legal procedures
When necessary for service provision (e.g., providing to payment gateway for payment processing)

section5.title: 5. Outsourcing of Personal Information Processing
section5.content: We outsource personal information processing tasks to external companies as follows to improve our services.
section5.note: When entering into outsourcing contracts, we stipulate and supervise necessary matters to ensure that contractors handle personal information safely in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act and related laws.

section6.title: 6. Rights of Users and Legal Representatives
section6.content: Users may exercise the following rights at any time.
rights: Request to stop processing personal information
section6.note: Rights can be exercised through the settings page or customer support, and we will take action without delay.

section7.title: 7. Installation and Operation of Automatic Collection Devices
section7.content: We operate 'cookies' that periodically store and retrieve user information.

cookie.what: A cookie is a small amount of information that a website sends to a user's browser.
cookie.purpose: Cookies are used for user convenience and to provide personalized services.
cookie.control: Users have the choice to accept cookies and can set cookie options through web browser settings to allow, block, or warn about cookies.

section8.title: 8. Security Measures
section8.content: In accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act, we take the following technical and administrative measures to ensure security.
measures: Personal information encryption: Passwords are encrypted for storage and management
Technical measures against hacking: Installation of firewalls, antivirus programs, etc.
Minimization and training of personal information handlers: Designation of personal information managers and regular training
Access control: Granting, changing, and revoking access rights to personal information processing systems

section9.title: 9. Privacy Officer
section9.content: We have designated a Privacy Officer who is responsible for overall personal information processing and handles complaints and remedies related to personal information processing.

contact.title: Privacy Officer
contact.name: Department: Pecal Operations Team
contact.note: For other reports or consultations regarding personal information infringement, please contact the following organizations.
agencies: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber Investigation Department (www.spo.go.kr / 1301)
National Police Agency Cyber Safety Bureau (cyberbureau.police.go.kr / 182)

section10.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
section10.content: This Privacy Policy is effective from the date of implementation, and if there are additions, deletions, or corrections due to changes in laws and policies, we will announce them through notices at least 7 days before the changes take effect.
